title: Sunrise, Sunset: Moni and George
creator_credit: Chris O'Rourke and Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group
brief_description: Some of the changes occurring in Australia in Australian industry. are examined in this programme. The episode looks at what has been the success of such changes. Moni, a bank employee, and George, an airport services co-ordinator, give their points of view.
